item.title: The Touryst: Deluxe announced for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

Featuring a new island, new items and quests, and more.

Shinâ€™en Multimedia has announced The Touryst: Deluxe, an expanded version of The Touryst exclusively for Switch 2. A release date was not announced.

The Touryst first launched for Switch on November 21, 2019, followed by Xbox One and PC via Microsoft Store on July 30, 2020, Xbox Series on November 10, 2020, PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on September 9, 2021, and PC via Steam on December 10, 2021.

The Touryst: Deluxe will feature new content, including a new island and monument to explore, new items and quests, and improved visuals in both handheld and docked mode.

Thanks, Nintendo Life.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/the-touryst-deluxe-announced-for-switch-2
